text: @marcorubio Wait...I think I'm reading this wrong. 60% of all the hospitalizations are there bcs of covid-19 (that's a lot!), and the last line says the remaining 40% are POSITIVE, but in hosp for something else. So 100% of those in hosp have covid-19. Correct? how is this good?
